\subsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
Class for performing user authentication tasks such as logging in the users etc. 

\subsection{Constructor \& Destructor Documentation}

\hypertarget{classauth_a057f051ca656f78a79ca981dacebc88e}{\index{auth@{auth}!config@{config}}
\index{config@{config}!auth@{auth}}
\subsubsection[{config}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}config (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{\$array}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classauth_a057f051ca656f78a79ca981dacebc88e}
sess\-Token\-Name -\/ key for the session token sess\-Key\-Name -\/ the session key name used to check whether or not someone's logged in sess\-Key\-Req\-Val -\/ value required for the sess\-Key\-Name in order for the user to be considered \char`\"{}logged in\char`\"{} login\-U\-R\-L -\/ path to U\-R\-L people must go to in order to login logout\-U\-R\-L -\/ path to U\-R\-L people are taken when they log out time\-Limit -\/ how long sessions should be kept for enforce\-U\-A\-String -\/ whether or not to enforce validity of the user agent string allow\-Remember\-Me -\/ whether or not to allow users to be \char`\"{}remembered\char`\"{} via cookie track\-Users\-Online -\/ whether or not to track users who are online sess\-Banned\-Val -\/ the permissions value for someone who has been banned logged\-In\-Location -\/ url to place where people are taken once they're logged in non\-Auth\-Location -\/ url to place where people are taken if they're not authorized to access a resource
